content:
The chunk introduces the "Sample Programs: Particles" section, explaining how to access sample programs for Panda3D depending on the operating system (Windows or Linux). It also mentions the presence of screenshots and an explanation that follows, setting up the context for discussing particle effects in detail.

Sample Programs: Particles

To run a sample program, you need to install Panda3D. If you're a Windows user, you'll find the sample programs in your start menu. If you're a Linux user, you'll find the sample programs in /usr/share/panda3d.

Screenshots

Explanation
